data.text:
Was here for 10 nights, enjoyed the hotel.
Close to Mashreq station 5 mins walk.
Very good location.
Will come back again.
Jamsadul was very nice to me and gave me all the advice I needed.
Also Ani at the travel desk sorted me out all the tours.
Breakfast ok
data.title: Dubai trip Feb 2024

data.text: Nice and comfortable stay, special thanks Mr Pramod and Mr Sujay who were kind enough to understand the needs. Spacious rooms and close to supermarkets and restaurants. Beds were comfortable and breakfast was mostly North Indian no south Indian options.
data.title: Golden tulip

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you very much for taking the time to write your review.

We are delighted to know how wonderful your experience was, and this feedback keeps us motivated to continue providing the best service. We will certainly pass your appreciation to Mr. Pramod  & Mr. Sujoy who will be happy to hear your compliments.

We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Best Regards,
Stephen Dsouza/ Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: Stephen Dsouza

data.text: It is a budget hotel in a very good and quiet place, close to metro station and Sheikh Zyad road. The staff was cooperative specially Manish who was very nice and polite. He made our stay very comfortable. The breakfast had limited menu but cooked to perfection and served with love.
data.title: Budget hotel, nice area

user_location.name: Kanpur, Kanpur Nagar District, Uttar Pradesh

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Abhivaj,

Thank you for sharing your lovely feedback.

We always strive to provide the very best service for all our guests and we are pleased to receive positive feedback from our valued guest like you. We will be sure to share your good words with our staff, especially Manish who made your stay more pleasant with her dedicated service.

Your good words are so inspiring and we assure you that we will keep on providing the highest quality of service to all our guests.

We're looking forward to welcoming you back for a great stay again.

Thanking you,
Stephen Dsouza | Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: Stephen Dsouza

data.text:
Location: Nicely located in Al Barsha behind Novotel, it is 15 min walk from Mall of Emirates and is surrounded by lot of Indian friendly restaurants / eateries.

Hotel rooms: I was in the basic room and its not spacious. Not great interiors.

Service/Food: Good breakfast (dont expect a 5 star spread but has good variety nevertheless. plus options for Indians. I also had taken the package inclusive of one set meal. here, the staff was cooperative to give me variety and sometimes even that outside of the set menu.

Bonus: HOtel offers free shuttle to Jumeirah Beach and Dubai Outlet Mall
data.title: Nice cosy low end business hotel

data.text: Good room and have a good service. The food is great. All staff is friendly. The facilities are are clean. And have fast service. Specialy the room boys. And mr jamsamdul is one of the best service always smiling
data.title: The room is always clean and the service is fast. 24/7 they are ready to help and they have smile on they face when i se
